imgDesc.text: A mysterious plant created by a Pari who has used the last of their strength. A lingering Pari with memories of ancient days is contained within.

<color=#ffe14b>Sorush</color> can use her power to <color=#ffe14b>awaken the Residual Pari inside the Fravashi Trees</color> . If the languishing obsessions of these spirits are extinguished, perhaps these Pari, thus scattered abroad, may yet meet again in the sea of flowers...
Offer the Plumes of Purifying Light you obtain from Fravashi Trees to the Amrita Pool and return all the memories of Khvarena back to the flowery sea!
